movie.plot: Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 11 nominations.

events.title: Abdul Karim delivers a mohur gold coin to Queen Victoria
